name: agents_get_profile
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool realty_in_us.
Tool description: This API helps to query properties for sale, rent, sold,etcâ€¦ to create a real estate site/application such as realtor.com
API description: Fetches the profile information for a real estate agent using their NRDS ID and advertiser ID.

nrds_id.description: The NRDS ID of the agent, typically returned from the /agents/list endpoint.

advertiser_id.description: The advertiser ID of the agent, typically returned from the /agents/list endpoint.
